actions.title: Â» Rhino Help Menu | Trolling/Fun Module
actions.name: Create Embed Message

actions.message:
Here are the trolling & Fun commands.

`8ball {text}` - 8ball stuffo
`hex` - Generates a random hex code.
`hack {user}` - Hack a user!
`911` - Call 911!
`tiny {text}` - Make text tiny 
`fidgetspinner` - How long will it spin? :wink:
`meme` - Sends a meme.
actions.name: Set Embed Description
